topic.title: OUT-PATIENT ATTENDANCE INDICATOR FOR RADIOTHERAPY DATA SET
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether the Radiotherapy Attendance requires an Out-Patient Attendance record for the purposes of the Radiotherapy Data Set.
